complete()

Method from base class, if return False luigi task is running, if True it ends.

output()

Method from base class to write logs of the luigi task

do_comp(cmd, interval)

This function is used when local scheduler is selected. It takes as input the cmd and and the interval between the compression task had to make the compression. The it executes the task executable passing the channel as parameter.

Parameters

  • cmd (str) – command bash

  • interval (list) – list of intervals

run()

Method from base class. Here checks the number of images, than create intervals using the batch size as dividend.

fractal.wrappers.conversionTaskWrap module

class fractal.wrappers.conversionTaskWrap.ConversionTaskWrap(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: luigi.task.Task

This class is a wrapper for the conversions task. It initialiazes the zarr folder then call the conversion task to populate the new zarr file with the arrays.

__init__(*args, **kwargs)
task_name = <luigi.parameter.Parameter object>

metadata(filename)

function to extract all the metadata stored in image’s filename. Return a list with all params.

Parameters

filename (str) – name of the image

unique(list_)

Giving a list with double values, return a list with unique values.

complete()

Method from base class, if return False luigi task is running, if True it ends.

output()

Method from base class to write logs of the luigi task

do_proc(cmd, c)

This function is used when local scheduler is selected. It takes as input the cmd and a channel. It executes the task executable, passing the channel as parameter.

Parameters

  • cmd (str) – command bash

  • c (str) – channel

run()

Method from base class. Here create the hierarchy of the zarr folder than launch the conversion task.
